## üöÄ Featured Projects

- üîÅ **[Cross-Chain Rebase Token](https://github.com/Eunum56/foundry-Rebase-Token)** ![Coverage](https://img.shields.io/badge/coverage-100%25-brightgreen?style=plastic)  
  A protocol enabling users to deposit into a vault and receive rebase tokens that represent their dynamically growing underlying balance. Integrates Chainlink CCIP for cross-chain functionality.

- üé® **[NFT Marketplace Core](https://github.com/Eunum56/your-nft-project-link)** ![Coverage](https://img.shields.io/badge/coverage-100%25-brightgreen?style=plastic)  
  A custom-built NFT system from scratch, covering minting, transferring, approvals, and ERC721 receiver mechanics, achieving 100% test coverage using Foundry.
